name: UIKeyboardAppearance
desc: Constants that specify the appearance of the keyboard for a text-based view.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Specifies the default keyboard appearance for the current input method.

items.name: case dark
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard appearance suitable for a dark UI look.

items.name: case light
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard appearance suitable for a light UI look.

items.name: static var alert: UIKeyboardAppearance
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard appearance suitable for an alert panel.
